headline: Gartner Survey Reveals Less Than Half of CSOs Report Their Organization Met Several 2024 Strategic Goals
summary: LAS VEGAS, May 21, 2025--Only 45% of CSOs report their organization met several 2024 strategic goals, according to a survey by Gartner, Inc. Experts presented their findings during the Gartner CSO & Sales Leader Conference, which took place here this week.
